alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:04PM CDT until June 11 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tipton County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Fayette County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Haywood County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brighton, or 9 miles southwest of Covington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Covington, Arlington, Munford, Somerville, Brighton, Dancyville, Tipton, Warren, Atoka, Oakland, Mason, Gallaway, Stanton, Burlison, Braden, Asbury, Yum Yum, Barretville, Egypt and Belmont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
